name: The Hunt for Ditto
description:
Hey guys!! Ever played Pokemon and tried to catch it but it would always run away!!! Well welcome to my game!! You have to try to get ditto but every time you try it runs away and more trainers come. this is similar to a classic game called Snake. Hope you Enjoy!!

Buttons:

W = Up

A= Left

S = Down

D = Right

Space = Restart (When Game is Over)

Hope you have fun!! 

Ditto: made by Pokemon Shuffle (Video Game)

Pokemon Red Sprite: (Pokemon FireRed and LeafGreen Video game)

Background Starmie: http://knowyourmeme.com/photos/1186080-pokefication-pokefied-characters

Ditto Gameover:  http://www.funnyjunk.com/funny_pictures/641679/Ditto/
